content: **knitted pumpkin decoration in drops lima the piece is worked in english rib theme halloween ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #dropssquashsquad drops design pattern li-217 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s - m - l height 4-5-6 cm **yarn** drops lima from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 50 g colour 9021 brick red/0707 rust and use a left-over of colour brown if you want a stalk 1 pumpkin weighs approx 10-14-28 g **needles** drops double pointed needles size 3 mm **accessories** wadding a cinnamon-stick of chosen length if you want the pumpkin to have an opening at the top **knitting gauge** 20 stitches in width and 44 row in height with english rib on needle size 3 mm = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches within 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches within 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
